entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Severn
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:11 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -30.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Severn Airport 10:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -30.6°C
Pressure: 102.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -34.1°C
Wind: WSW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:48 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:48 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 5:48 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
